unnormalised: Crop insurance, crucial for farmers like my kaka in Maharashtra. Lost his entire jowar crop in the floods of 2021, due to heavy rains on 15/08/2021. Heard PMFBY helped some, but the paperwork, bhaiyya! Rs. 10,000/acre promised but disbursement slow. Anyone else facing issues getting claims processed after the 2023 monsoon? 06/07/2023 floods at 14:00 hrs wiped out his paddy too! NABARD needs to simplify this. Meeting the agriculture officer on 22/09/2024 at 10:00 hrs. Hoping for some good news. Jai Kisan!
normalised: Crop insurance, crucial for farmers like my kaka in Maharashtra. Lost his entire jowar crop in the floods of two thousand and twenty one, due to heavy rains on fifteenth august two thousand and twenty one. Heard P M F B Y helped some, but the paperwork, bhaiyya! Rupee ten thousand per acre promised but disbursement slow. Anyone else facing issues getting claims processed after the two thousand and twenty three monsoon? Sixth july two thousand and twenty three floods at fourteen zero zero hours wiped out his paddy too! N A B A R D needs to simplify this. Meeting the agriculture officer on twenty second september two thousand and twenty four at ten zero zero hours. Hoping for some good news. Jai Kisan!
